mapper.select: select count(*) from (select * from gifticon where user_id = #{userId}) gftT, product prdT, brand brdT, (select code, code_name from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS') stusT where gftT.prod_code = prdT.code and prdT.brd_code = brdT.code and gftT.gft_stus_code = stusT.code

select gftT.*, gftT.img_path brcdImgPath, gftT.prod_code prdCode, prdT.name prdName, brdT.name brdName, prdT.img_path prdImgPath, stusT.code_name from (select * from gifticon where user_id = #{userId}) gftT, product prdT, brand brdT, (select code, code_name from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS') stusT where gftT.prod_code = prdT.code and prdT.brd_code = brdT.code and gftT.gft_stus_code = stusT.code
limit #{amount} offset ${(pageNum-1) * amount};

select gftT.*, gftT.img_path brcdImgPath, gftT.prod_code prdCode, prdT.name prdName, brdT.name brdName, prdT.img_path prdImgPath, stusT.code_name from (select * from gifticon where user_id = #{userId} and id = #{gftId}) gftT, product prdT, brand brdT, (select code, code_name from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS') stusT where gftT.prod_code = prdT.code and prdT.brd_code = brdT.code and gftT.gft_stus_code = stusT.code
